00060 // Memory allocation macros to be used by sound engine plug-ins.
00061 #if defined (AK_MEMDEBUG)
00062 
00063     AkForceInline void * operator new(size_t size,AK::IAkPluginMemAlloc * in_pAllocator,const char* szFile,AkUInt32 ulLine) throw()
00064     {
00065         return in_pAllocator->dMalloc( size, szFile, ulLine );
00066     }
00067     
00068 #endif
00069 
00070     AkForceInline void * operator new(size_t size,AK::IAkPluginMemAlloc * in_pAllocator) throw()
00071     {
00072         return in_pAllocator->Malloc( size );
00073     }
00074     
00075     #ifdef AK_PS3
00076     AkForceInline void * operator new(size_t size, unsigned int align, AK::IAkPluginMemAlloc * in_pAllocator) throw()
00077     {
00078         return in_pAllocator->Malloc( size );
00079     }
00080     #endif

00083     AkForceInline void operator delete(void *,AK::IAkPluginMemAlloc *) throw() {}

00116 template <class T>
00117 AkForceInline void AK_PLUGIN_DELETE( AK::IAkPluginMemAlloc * in_pAllocator, T * in_pObject )      
00118 {
00119     if ( in_pObject )
00120     {
00121         in_pObject->~T();
00122         in_pAllocator->Free( in_pObject );
00123     }
00124 }

00132 #define AK_PLUGIN_FREE(_allocator,_pvmem)       (_allocator)->Free((_pvmem))
